item.title: TikTok Video Ad Edit - Upwork
item.description:
One of our founders was featured in a clip from a nationally recognized talk show and I'd like to turn it into a TikTok ad. The clip itself is short and a unique cut so it's an interesting challenge.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 21, 2024 01:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
